philosophical_framework.hunter_gatherer_calibration_zero: Every expensive wellness practice reconstructs what foragers received as environmental default. If you have to pay for it, buy a device, or schedule it — it was probably free in the ancestral environment.

philosophical_framework.adhd_first_principle: If it works for ADHD — it works for everyone. Executive dysfunction is the default under stress, not a minority condition.
philosophical_framework.anankastic_paradox: Rigid structures coexist with ADHD spontaneity needs — compensatory architecture, not contradiction
invisible_mechanisms: Meal timing architecture — shapes circadian gene expression
Posture ecology — chairs create chronic flexion vs ancestral squat
Light spectrum — artificial light suppresses melatonin 50-80% vs firelight
Social synchronization — modern schedules desync co-regulation
Temperature variability — thermoneutral zones eliminate thermogenesis
Sound environment — constant low-freq noise activates sympathetic

scientific_foundation.polyvagal_hierarchy: Ventral vagal (social engagement) → sympathetic (fight/flight) → dorsal vagal (freeze/shutdown). Environment determines autonomic mode.
scientific_foundation.interoception_adhd_loop: Diminished body-signal reading in ADHD → poor decisions → worse interoception. Passive profiling as workaround.
scientific_foundation.polyvagal_interoception_bridge: Vagal tone directly modulates interoceptive accuracy via vagus afferents to insular cortex. Higher HRV = better interoceptive sensitivity. Critical for ADHD self-regulation given baseline interoceptive deficits.

multi_scale_rhythms.circabidian: ~48h alternating high/low days — may explain ADHD good/bad day alternation (plausible, requires qualification)
